Vanquish

Vanquish

Begone, defeated worm! You are unworthy of facing me!

"Vanquish" ability
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Vanquish

40
Character ability
Duration:15 seconds
Target:

Self

Affects allies in range

Effect range:40m
Effects:

+20% Speed

+50% Charge bonus

Ares' Rage

Ares' Rage

By Ares, I shall drown the world in flames!

"Ares' Rage" ability
+2.5% to this Hero's hitpoints

Ares' Rage

120
Hero ability
Duration:45 seconds
Target:

Self

Rage cost:100
Effects:

+100% Weapon Damage

Causes Fear

Berserk

Causes Fear
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their morale when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Berserk
This unit will go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies.

Berserk

Causes Fear
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their morale when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Berserk
This unit will go berserk during the battle. This makes them uncontrollable, they will automatically attack nearby enemies.
